snippet.title: Scarlet Manor: The Heir - Trailer
snippet.description:
We're super excited to announce Scarlet Manor: The Heir, a 2D #pointandclick adventure horror game filled with puzzles and mysteries to solve.

Wishlist now! The Manor awaits for you! https://bit.ly/ScarletManor

#indiegames #horrorgame #WishlistWednesday #newgame #gaming #indiedev #gamedev #gamedesign
